## 2: Congruential generators

Find all of the cycles of the following congruential ge-
nerator. For each cycle identify which seeds X0 lead to
that cycle:

```{r cars}
generator <- function(x_n1, n){
  for (i in 1:n){
    print(x_n1)
    x_n1 <- (9 * x_n1 + 3) %% 11
  }
}
```
